The *Parliaments in the Pandemic* (PiP) collaboration held their 3rd academic workshop on 14-15 November 2022 to discuss the first analyses of their international expert panel survey on how parliaments around the globe were affected by the Covid pandemic.

PiP is a global collaboration organized by the RCLS and supported by SYRI, Prague, and the Institute for Parliamentary Research, Berlin. More on PiP can be found [here](https://ipsa-rcls.us14.list-manage.com/track/click?u=9e8e5fee34408aefe77d10eab&id=8eb7c8d68c&e=00fcecc5b2).
